mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_iolist ( d_code, d_name, d_sid, d_ceo, d_tel, d_addr, d_product ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{d_name}, #{d_sid}, #{d_ceo}, #{d_tel}, #{d_addr}, #{d_product} )
